verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they put <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6879>leper,<s%> and every <S%H3605>one<s%> that hath an <S%H2100>issue,<s%> and <S%H3605>whosoever<s%> is <S%H2931>defiled<s%> by the dead: <S%H5315><s%>

Both <S%H4480>male<s%> <S%H2145><s%> <S%H5704>and<s%> <S%H5347>female<s%> shall ye put <S%H7971>out,<s%> <S%H413>without<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> shall ye <S%H7971>put<s%> them; that they <S%H2930>defile<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4264>camps,<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7931>dwell.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and put them <S%H7971>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H413>without<s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2403>sin<s%> that <S%H120>men<s%> commit, to <S%H4603>do<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> be <S%H816>guilty;<s%>

Then they shall <S%H3034>confess<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done:<s%> and he shall <S%H7725>recompense<s%> <S%H853>his<s%> <S%H817>trespass<s%> with the <S%H7218>principal<s%> thereof, and <S%H3254>add<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> it the <S%H2549>fifth<s%> part thereof, and <S%H5414>give<s%> it unto him against <S%H834>whom<s%> he hath <S%H816>trespassed.<s%>

But <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to <S%H7725>recompense<s%> the <S%H817>trespass<s%> <S%H413>unto,<s%> let the <S%H817>trespass<s%> be <S%H7725>recompensed<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even to the <S%H3548>priest;<s%> <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H905><s%> the <S%H352>ram<s%> of the <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> <S%H834>whereby<s%> an atonement shall be <S%H3722>made<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> him.

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8641>offering<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the holy <S%H6944>things<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H7126>bring<s%> unto the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his.

And every <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H853><s%> hallowed <S%H6944>things<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his: <S%H834>whatsoever<s%> any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> his.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H3588>If<s%> any <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H376><s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> go <S%H7847>aside,<s%> and <S%H4603>commit<s%> a <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against him,

And a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> her <S%H7902>carnally,<s%> <S%H2233><s%> and it be <S%H5956>hid<s%> from the <S%H4480>eyes<s%> <S%H5869><s%> of her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and be kept <S%H5641>close,<s%> and <S%H1931>she<s%> be <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> and there be <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against her, <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> be <S%H8610>taken<s%> with the manner;

And the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> <S%H853><s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H1931>she<s%> be <S%H2930>defiled:<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> if the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> <S%H853><s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and <S%H1931>she<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> defiled: <S%H2930><s%>

Then shall the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and he shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H7133>offering<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> her, the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7058>meal;<s%> he shall <S%H3332>pour<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3828>frankincense<s%> <S%H5921>thereon;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is an <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy,<s%> an <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial,<s%> bringing iniquity to <S%H2142>remembrance.<s%> <S%H5771><s%>
And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall bring her <S%H7126>near,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and <S%H5975>set<s%> her <S%H6440>before<s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel;<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> in the <S%H7172>floor<s%> of the <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it <S%H413>into<s%> the water: <S%H4325><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6544>uncover<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%> of <S%H2146>memorial<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> her <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> is the <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H4503>offering:<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H1961>have<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causeth the curse: <S%H779><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall charge her by an <S%H7650>oath,<s%> <S%H853><s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H7901>lain<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee, and <S%H518>if<s%> thou hast <S%H3808>not<s%> gone <S%H7847>aside<s%> to <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%> with another instead <S%H8478>of<s%> thy <S%H376>husband,<s%> be thou <S%H5352>free<s%> from <S%H428>this<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4480>water<s%> <S%H4325><s%> that causeth the curse: <S%H779><s%>

But <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast gone <S%H7847>aside<s%> to another instead <S%H8478>of<s%> thy <S%H376>husband,<s%> and <S%H3588>if<s%> thou be <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> and some <S%H376>man<s%> have <S%H5414>lain<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H7903><s%> with thee <S%H4480>beside<s%> <S%H1107><s%> thine husband: <S%H376><s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H7650>charge<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> with an <S%H7621>oath<s%> of <S%H423>cursing,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H802>woman,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>make<s%> thee a <S%H423>curse<s%> and an <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth <S%H5414>make<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to <S%H5307>rot,<s%> and thy <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H6639>swell;<s%>

And <S%H428>this<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>go<s%> into thy <S%H4578>bowels,<s%> to make thy <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H6638>swell,<s%> and thy <S%H3409>thigh<s%> to <S%H5307>rot:<s%> And the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H543>Amen,<s%> <S%H543>amen.<s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H423>curses<s%> in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and he shall blot them <S%H4229>out<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> water: <S%H4325><s%>

And he shall <S%H853>cause<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4751>bitter<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse:<s%> and the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into her, and become <S%H4751>bitter.<s%>

Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H4503>offering<s%> out of the <S%H802>woman's<s%> <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4503>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H7126>offer<s%> it <S%H413>upon<s%> the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall take a <S%H7061>handful<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H4503>offering,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> the <S%H234>memorial<s%> thereof, and <S%H6999>burn<s%> it upon the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> shall <S%H853>cause<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>water.<s%>

And when he hath made her to <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> then it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that, <S%H518>if<s%> she be <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> and have <S%H4603>done<s%> <S%H4604>trespass<s%> against her <S%H376>husband,<s%> that the <S%H4325>water<s%> that causeth the <S%H779>curse<s%> shall <S%H935>enter<s%> into her, and become <S%H4751>bitter,<s%> and her <S%H990>belly<s%> shall <S%H6638>swell,<s%> and her <S%H3409>thigh<s%> shall <S%H5307>rot:<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H423>curse<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> her <S%H5971>people.<s%>
And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2930>defiled,<s%> but be <S%H2889>clean;<s%> then she shall be <S%H5352>free,<s%> and shall <S%H2232>conceive<s%> <S%H2233>seed.<s%>

This <S%H2063><s%> is the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousies,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> goeth <S%H7847>aside<s%> to another instead <S%H8478>of<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> and is <S%H2930>defiled;<s%>

Or <S%H176><s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H5674>cometh<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he be <S%H7065>jealous<s%> <S%H853><s%> over his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and shall <S%H5975>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> upon <S%H853>her<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H8451>law.<s%>

Then shall the <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H5352>guiltless<s%> from <S%H4480>iniquity,<s%> <S%H5771><s%> and <S%H1931>this<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> her <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
